column4: /dev/hda8       /home/jack/music vfat   uid=jack,defaults       0       4 like that snoops but change uid for gid
aren't uid and gid for filesystems which don't support permissions? He is asking about an ext3 partition...
ahh i hadnt read up, if its ext3 then jus chown the whole partiton?
that's what i suggested to him, but he doesn't seem keen...
